definition: to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind
to make one's home in a place/to settle

sentences.english: Appears in the newspapers, the national only environment deodorizes the laboratory to settle down Jinmen.
sentences.chinese: 报载，全国唯一的环境“除臭”实验室落户津门。
你能在这里安家落户吗？

sentences.english: Famous firms attract less well-known ones to set up nearby.
sentences.chinese: 大公司也吸引了许多名不见经传的小公司落户于此。

sentences.english: Now it is finding a home in China.
sentences.chinese: 于国外，现在沙画在中国安家落户。

sentences.english: He settled down here ten years ago.

sentences.chinese: 他们已经在海南岛安家落户。

sentences.english: To qualify for permanent residency, applicants must hold a Shanghai Residency Card and have lived in the city for at least seven years.
sentences.chinese: 申请落户者必须持有上海市居住证满7年。

sentences.english: The clients registered and settled in QiangMing, Economy City is the beginning of cooperating between both parties.
sentences.chinese: 客商到强民经济城注册落户，是双方合作的开始。

sentences.english: Two years ago 1 left the city and went to settle down in the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 两年前离开城市到农村去插队落户。

sentences.english: The state shall encourage veteran cadres to settle in the countryside or in small or medium-sized cities or towns.
sentences.chinese: 国家鼓励离休干部到农村或中小城镇安家落户。

sentences.english: He has determined to settle down in the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 他决定在农村安家落户。

sentences.english: Settle of hotel of east of first case forest at Beijing on the west the square austral passenger station.
sentences.chinese: 首家格林东方酒店落户于北京西客运站南广场。

sentences.english: Article IX Guarantee the construction land of project settled in Xi Xian New Area.
sentences.chinese: 第九条西咸新区保证落户项目建设用地。

sentences.english: You are mentally dwelling with error in your mind.
sentences.chinese: 你在心理上落户于你内心的错误想法上。

sentences.english: We will carry out reform of the household registration system and relax requirements for household registration in towns and small and medium-sized cities.
sentences.chinese: 推进户籍制度改革，放宽中小城市和小城镇落户条件。

sentences.english: Many professors have made their homes in Rizhao.
sentences.chinese: 日照吸引了不少教授在这里安家落户。

to enter and garrison/(fig.) to establish a presence in
